DOC.brief_title: THE OMEGA-SPM-DOSE OMEGA-SPM-PAD : Specialized Pro-Resolving Mediators Patients With Peripheral Artery Disease
DOC.detailed_description: The OMEGA-SPM-DOSE trial OMEGA-SPM-PAD trial two part pilot study aim investigate effect novel formulation nutritional supplement contain highly concentrate n-3 PUFA metabolite ( SPM Emulsion ) metabolo-lipidomic profile healthy volunteer patient PAD . Ten healthy volunteer ten patient PAD participate Part 1a , `` OMEGA-SPM-DOSE Study '' . A follow-up , placebo control , prospective study best dose modality determine Phase 1a take place wider PAD population ( n=30 ) , Phase 1b - `` OMEGA-SPM-PAD Study '' . Specific measurement include target metabolo-lipidomic profiling , establish marker inflammation , functional monocyte macrophage assay . The propose study potential provide important new insight role nutritional intervention PAD .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers : Age 2080 PAD Patients : Mild claudication rest pain ( Rutherford 14 ) Resting exercise ABI < 0.9 TBI < 0.6 Age 40 PAD Patients healthy volunteer : Plan undergo surgical procedure PVI treatment PAD within one month Evidence active infection Hypersensitivity allergy fish seafood Already n3 PUFA equivalent Chronic liver disease , endstage renal disease ( CKD 5 ) , chronic inflammatory disorder Poorly control diabetes ( HbA1C > 8 % ) BMI < 20 > 35 Recent major surgery illness within 30 day Use immunosuppressive medication steroid History organ transplantation Pregnancy , plan become pregnant , lactate Healthy Volunteers : hsCRP > 2mg/L Regular aspirin use Regular nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug use
